aboutcontent.title: Mission
aboutcontent.content: Mk Metal Tasarım was established in 2019 to serve on design and manufacturing. We aim to see happy faces by producing the most suitable and best designs for our customers.

aboutcontentsecond.title: Vision
aboutcontentsecond.content: As MK Metal Tasarım, we aim to produce special products by following the requirements of the modern age and the understanding of quality by directing the future and design.
